scripts.make:model: sequelize model:generate --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models --underscored --attributes example_field:string --name
scripts.make:migration: sequelize migration:generate --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models --name
scripts.make:seed: sequelize seed:generate --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models --name
scripts.migrate: sequelize db:migrate --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models
scripts.migrate:rollback: sequelize db:migrate:undo --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models
scripts.migrate:rollback:to: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models --to
scripts.migrate:status: sequelize db:migrate:status --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models
scripts.db:seed: sequelize db:seed --config config/sequelize.js --migrations-path backend/database/migrations --seeders-path backend/database/seeders --models-path backend/models --seed
